newest.message:
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug where an Asset distance from character's last known location where not in sync when Character info updated. * Fixed a bug where notifications where not displayed in a Character monitor on EVEMon launch and notifications are available. * Fixed a visual bug where non-implemented API calls where shown in the character's API timer tooltip. * Fixed a crash bug when closing a character's Pie Chart when the character doesn't have skills info. * Fixed a crash bug for the rare case where a skill has itself as a prerequisite (only seen in Non-Public skills like 'Polaris').
== Enhancements ==
* Added reaction material info for reactions in Item Browser. * Added control tower fuel info for control towers in Item Browser.
== Misc ==
* Switched the exporting to CSV delimiter to use semicolon instead of comma, in order to support number formatting for different cultures. * Several improvements have been done to the base code to make EVEMon a better, faster and more stable application.
